bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1270305 Patch: added missing requires.
Description of problem:
In python2-python-etcd, python3-python-etcd rpm packages missing depends on python-urllib3, python3-urllib3 rpm.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): python2-python-etcd-0.4.3-5.fc25.noarch, python3-python-etcd-0.4.3-5.fc25.noarch
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create vm from the Fedora-Cloud-Base-25-1.3.x86_64.qcow2 image for OpenStack. 2. Logon to vm and install python-etcd. 3. Exec # rpm -qR python2-python-etcd etcd python(abi) = 2.7 python-dns rpmlib(CompressedFileNames) <= 3.0.4-1 rpmlib(FileDigests) <= 4.6.0-1 rpmlib(PartialHardlinkSets) <= 4.0.4-1 rpmlib(PayloadFilesHavePrefix) <= 4.0-1 rpmlib(PayloadIsXz) <= 5.2-1
# cat test.py #!/usr/bin/python
import etcd
client = etcd.Client(host='127.0.0.1', port=2379)
print client.read('/test', recursive=True)
# ./test.py Traceback (most recent call last): File "./test.py", line 3, in <module> import etcd File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/etcd/__init__.py", line 2, in <module> from .client import Client File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/etcd/client.py", line 17, in <module> import urllib3 ImportError: No module named urllib3
Actual results: No dependencies between python-etcd and python-urllib3 packages.
Expected results: When install the package python-etcd, python-urllib3 package will be installed.

Thanks for the patch, Oleg!
Applied to python-etcd-0.4.5-2
python-etcd-0.4.5-2.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-482b333c18
python-etcd-0.4.5-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2538a71660

python-etcd-0.4.5-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2538a71660

python-etcd-0.4.5-2.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
python-etcd-0.4.5-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
